title: Safety-Critical Communications
content: Effective communication is critical during drilling operations, emergencies, and PTW management. Use closed-loop communication for safety-critical instructions. Standard terminology reduces misunderstanding. Communication barriers include noise, language, hierarchy, and remote coordination (rig floor to doghouse). Design communication systems for worst-case conditions.
openQuestions: Does your crew use closed-loop communication for safety-critical tasks?
What communication failures have you witnessed or experienced?
